content.rendered:
OUR NEW LASH ADHESIVE EYELINER

I’m so excited to share that our new D’Lashes Adhesive Eyeliner was in the press in Women’s Wear Daily, InStyle.com, and so many more publications!  

This amazing eyeliner pen will make your strip lash application a game changer! This D’Modern liquid adhesive liner acts as a dual purpose high drama felt tip pen. It draws a high-pigment, flawless line. Features a super-fine felt tip for precise application. 

The D’Felt adhesive eyeliner is great for a cat eye, or just for giving an extreme thick line for more Drama! Line, Lash and Done!

Click on the following product names to shop – D’Lashes Matte Lipstick, D’Lashes Candles, New Lash Adhesive Eyeliner, our Lash Wash, and lash out with D’Medium Flare individual lashes and our popular D’Wispy Lashes.

Xo Xo, Dionne
